title: I just went to Verizon and they said my Pixel 3A XL is not compatible. It's supposed to be unlocked.
content:
Verizon said my Pixel 3a XL is not compatible, so ai believe my device is with some problem because it's supposed to be unlocked. How can I check what the problem is?



UPDATE: OK guys. I went to another store and the said it was compatible, the first store I went was a franchise so probably that's the reason why they could not do that.
